thread.title: 'Star Wars: The Force Awakens' Reveals Death Star in New Poster
thread.title_full: 'Star Wars: The Force Awakens' Reveals Death Star in New Poster

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: 'Star Wars: The Force Awakens' Reveals Death Star in New Poster
text:
Comments Lucasfilm also announces when the new trailer for the J.J. Abrams-directed movie will make its way out. 
A new poster for " Star Wars: The Force Awakens " has arrived online. It features some of the main characters played by Harrison Ford , John Boyega , Daisy Ridley , and Adam Driver . It also gives a look at Princess Leia and what looks like Death Star. Lucasfilm also announces that the film's new trailer will debut on ESPN's "Monday Night Football" on October 19. It will be premiered during halftime of the National Football League (NFL) game between the New York Giants and the Philadelphia Eagles in Philadelphia. Check out the new official poster! Tune in to @ESPN �s Monday Night Football for a new look at #TheForceAwakens . pic.twitter.com/NTRWLlVyID � Star Wars (@starwars) October 18, 2015 Following the trailer launch, tickets to the highly anticipated cinematic event will be on sale everywhere movie tickets are sold. Directed by J.J. Abrams, the film itself is scheduled to opens in U.S. theaters on December 18. Oscar Isaac , Lupita Nyong'o , and Andy Serkis also join the cast.
